title: ParameterSchema
description: A schema file defining the parameters used in running the code mining.

CodesOccurWith.description: The minimum number of different codes a patient must co-occur with to be used.

CaseDefinitions.description: The information about the codes that define each case.

^[a-zA-Z]+$.description: A class definition comprising a set of codes.

DiscardThreshold.description: The posterior probability that an example must have to be included in the final model.

Epoch.description: The number of epochs to use.

ElasticNetMixing.description: The elastic net mixing values to use.

PatientsOccurWith.description: The minimum number of different patients a code must co-occur with to be used.
